reference.shortdesc: A created element specifies the document creation date using the date attribute.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , and the attribute defined below.

dlentry.dd: Specifies the document creation date. The format is YYYY-MM-DD where YYYY is the year, MM is the month from 01 to 12, and DD is the day from 01-31. See A Summary of the International Standard Date and Time Notation for background.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows that the topic was created on the twelth day of June in 2020.
